name: snorlium-z--held
effect: Held: Allows snorlax to upgrade giga impact into pulverizing pancake.
short_effect: Held: Allows Snorlax to upgrade Giga Impact into Pulverizing Pancake.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
This is a crystallized form of Z-Power.
It upgrades Snorlax’s Giga Impact to a Z-Move.
